ETYMOLOGY: Compound phrase combining the prepositional phrase 'in addition' (from Latin additio, 'the act of adding') and the preposition 'to'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A phrase functioning grammatically as a single preposition, used to introduce an item that is being added to something else.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: As well as; besides; over and above what has been mentioned or specified.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 除了…之外；此外；另外。用于引出附加或补充的事物。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: In addition to his full-time job, he teaches night classes twice a week.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 除了全职工作外，他每周还上两次夜校。
